name: Herr Apelsin i spöklabytinten
description:
Life is not easy for Herr Apelsin. 

While babysitting, all the baby oranges left for the scary mazes where the ghosts dwell. 

Save them from the ghosts and bring them back to the orange crate, please!

Play with keyboard (Arrowkeys or WASD and Spacebar) or with a Xbox controller.
